message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I would like to propose a price of $950000.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counterpropose a price of $975000.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I think we're getting close to a deal. I'm counteroffering at $1015000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can wrap this up soon.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I value your effort in reaching a compromise. I would like to counterpropose a price of $995000.
